meanings.sent1: The magician's trick was surprising to the audience.
meanings.sent2: It was surprising to see a rainbow after the storm.
meanings.sent3: It was surprising to find a penguin in the desert.
meanings.sent4: The sudden burst of laughter was as surprising as a bolt of lightning.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected plot twist in the movie was truly surprising.

meanings.sent1: The surprising news caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent2: It's surprising to see snow in the middle of summer.
meanings.sent3: It was surprising to see a cat wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: The surprising turn of events left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent5: The surprising discovery of a hidden treasure amazed the explorers.
